input: user: An astronaut floating in space, with the Earth visible over the shoulder and the sparkling stars of the universe beyond. The experience is awe-inspiring and infinite.

Capture the astronaut's gaze directly into the camera, eyes wide with awe reflecting the infinite wonder of the cosmos, inspiring a sense of pure exhilaration and cosmic insignificance.
